alert.note: Alert for Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 19 at 2:54AM MST until December 20 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. In the Upper Weiser Basin, total snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches. In the West Central Mountains, total accumulation of 3 to 5 inches in mountain valleys with 6 to 10 inches above 6000 feet. Wind gusts of 15 to 20 mph in mountain valleys this afternoon with gusts to 30 mph at higher elevations. * WHERE...West Central Mountains and Upper Weiser River zones. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travelers will encounter winter driving conditions north of Midvale on Highway 95 and north of Smiths Ferry on Highway 55. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. &&

area.areaDesc: Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
